review: Love the convenience of the Fire TV Stick, works great, arrived early...would definitely recommend. The reason for a 4 and not a 5 is I am already bored with it. As a member of Amazon Prime, I find that you have to pay for almost everything you want to view and it's pricey.
author: Melissa M.

review: This little device is a life saver when nothing is on TV. I have spent countless hours since receiving it just watching Netflix and the streaming is seamless. I am so happy that I purchased this. I love that it is portable. Just throw it in your bag and go.
author: inthe802

review: I installed these on 2 tvs in less than 15 minutes. I have Amazon Prime (which I love) and I subscribe to Netflix and this works great. I would recommend these to anyone
author: Amazon Customer

review: My experience with this is not very great and hence, 2-stars. My detailed review on this can be read on this link:http://nnanda2011.wordpress.com/2014/12/08/a-weekend-with-amazon-firetv-stick/
author: Niranjan Nanda

review: I had no idea what to expect when I purchased the Fire TV Stick. Best Buy had it on sale for $24.95 and I figured if at the very least I could watch NetFlix it would be worth it. It is so much more than I expected. So many free apps with free content. Some apps basically add tv statikns for free. It is very fast too. It worth the cost. I would recommend even at full price. I didn't plan to sign up for Amazon Prime and figured I would just cancel once free trial is up, however I think I will miss all the added benifits.
author: Brandi Jardine

review: Worked great the first day. Since then it either won't connect to WiFi, or when it does it struggles to stay connected. Other devices work fine and have no connection issues.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Works great! Faster than my Roku 3.Works flawlessly with Plex.Bought a few to give as gifts.
author: Bob Romero

review: Awesomely useful. Lets me access all the great streaming services with ease.
author: Chris N

review: Worked great right out of the box with little or no effort. I'm a fan!!
